body:
A small quality of life improvement:

```python
In [1]: from spack.util.environment import EnvironmentModifications

In [2]: x = EnvironmentModifications()

In [3]: x.set("A", "B")

In [4]: x.append_path("PATH", "/some/path")

In [5]: print(x)
EnvironmentModifications with 2 modifications:
SetEnv: A=B
AppendPath: PATH+/some/path
```
title: Implement __str__ for EnvironmentModifications and friends
